Current Script content:
Current Script: res://entity.gd

class_name Entity
extends CharacterBody2D

# 02. Signals
signal entity_died(entity)
signal took_damage(amount, knockback_force)

# 03. Constants
const KNOCKBACK_FORCE: float = 300.0

# 04. Componentes (Devem ser configurados no Inspector)
@export var health_component: HealthComponent
@export var movement_component: MovementComponent
@export var animation_component: AnimationComponent

# 05. Estados
enum State { IDLE, WALK, ATTACK, HURT, DEATH }
var current_state: State = State.IDLE
var is_dying: bool = false
var facing_direction: Vector2 = Vector2.DOWN

func _ready() -> void:
	# Configura conexões básicas
	if health_component:
		health_component.died.connect(_on_died)
		health_component.took_damage.connect(_on_health_took_damage)

	if not movement_component:
		movement_component = get_node_or_null("MovementComponent")
	if not animation_component:
		animation_component = get_node_or_null("AnimationComponent")

	# Adiciona ao grupo 'entities' para facilitar buscas globais
	add_to_group("entities")

func _physics_process(delta: float) -> void:
	if is_dying: return

	# Lógica básica de estado (Override nas classes filhas)
	handle_state(delta)
	
	# Atualiza direção visual se houver movimento
	if velocity.length() > 0:
		facing_direction = velocity.normalized()
		if animation_component:
			animation_component.update_direction(facing_direction)

# Método virtual para ser sobrescrito
func handle_state(delta: float) -> void:
	pass

# --- Interface de Dano Padronizada ---
# Assinatura única: take_damage(amount: int, knockback_source: Vector2)
func take_damage(amount: int, knockback_source: Vector2 = Vector2.ZERO) -> void:
	if is_dying: return
	
	if health_component:
		health_component.take_damage(amount)
	
	if knockback_source != Vector2.ZERO and movement_component:
		var knockback_dir = (global_position - knockback_source).normalized()
		movement_component.apply_knockback(knockback_dir, KNOCKBACK_FORCE)
		
	if animation_component:
		animation_component.flash_damage()
		
	took_damage.emit(amount, knockback_source)

# --- Callbacks ---
func _on_health_took_damage(amount: int) -> void:
	# Pode ser usado para sons ou UI global
	pass

func _on_died() -> void:
	if is_dying: return
	is_dying = true
	current_state = State.DEATH
	entity_died.emit(self)
	
	# Lógica padrão de morte (pode ser sobrescrita)
	if animation_component:
		animation_component.play("death")
		await get_tree().create_timer(1.0).timeout
	
	queue_free()
